issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi all,

I saw this error a couple of time in tickets but nothing resolved my problem.
I'm using Titanium Studio and i bought indie version yesterday and want to try blackberry sdk beta. So I follow tutorial here https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tis/BlackBerry+Support , and now i can create mobile project with bb support.
But when i run it, console says :
[TRACE] Logging Simulator output to c:\docume~1\ncayet\locals~1\temp\tmppkv3lk
[INFO] Starting Blackberry 9550 Simulator
[DEBUG] C:\Program Files\Appcelerator\Titanium Studio\plugins\net.rim.ejde.componentpack5.0.0_5.0.0.25\components\simulator\fledge.exe /handheld=9550 /app-param=JvmAlxConfigFile:9550.xml /pin=0x2100000A /data-port=0x4d44 /data-port=0x4d4e /session=9550 /app=C:\Program Files\Appcelerator\Titanium Studio\plugins\net.rim.ejde.componentpack5.0.0_5.0.0.25\components\simulator\Jvm.dll /app-param=DisableRegistration /JvmNoBreakOnThrowable /app-param=JvmDebugFile:c:\docume~1\ncayet\locals~1\temp\tmppkv3lk /fs-sdcard=true/fs-sdcard-path=C:\Documents and Settings\ncayet\.titanium\blackberry\sdcard
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Documents and Settings\ncayet\Application Data\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\1.7.0.RC2\blackberry\builder.py", line 528, in <module>
    builder.start_simulator(get_simulator_id(), should_clear_sdcard())
  File "C:\Documents and Settings\ncayet\Application Data\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\1.7.0.RC2\blackberry\builder.py", line 359, in start_simulator
    p = subprocess.Popen(start_simulator_cmd, cwd = self.components_simulator_dir)
  File "C:\Program Files\Appcelerator\Titanium Studio\plugins\com.appcelerator.titanium.python.win32_1.0.0.1313011725\python\lib\subprocess.py", line 594, in __init__
    errread, errwrite)
  File "C:\Program Files\Appcelerator\Titanium Studio\plugins\com.appcelerator.titanium.python.win32_1.0.0.1313011725\python\lib\subprocess.py", line 822, in _execute_child
    startupinfo)
WindowsError: [Error 3] Le chemin d'acc�s sp�cifi� est introuvable
Le chemin d'acc�s sp�cifi� est introuvable meaning "file not found"...

I've tried to install all Blackberry Java SDK by the "get SDK" link in Titanium's Preferences but no one want to show me a simulator in the list.


Thanks for responses
fields.summary: No simulator available for Blackberry on studio 1.7.0.RC2

comments.body:
Hello,

this is not a bug. Please install the Blackberry SDK and Java SDK first, as stated in:

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tis/BlackBerry+Support#BlackBerrySupport-JavaRequirements

The install SDK in Ti Studio is only for Ti Mobile SDK updates. 

Best,

Mauro

Below, a screenshot of the list shown when i click on "Get SDK" link for blackberry, i do not get the same list described in tutorial but i've installed the whole list :
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/441/sstitaniumsdkforblackbe.jpg/

Secondly, this is my titanium preferences window, it shows that blackberry sdks are available :
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/52/sstitaniumpref.jpg/


I followed your tuto, and nothing happen. Java SDK and related paths are well set.
Titanium sdks list shown when "get sdk" link is clicked in blackberry preferences
Titanium preferences showing that bb sdks are available
